title: Animation Lag
body: Every game when I play my animations will stop playing for a few seconds. This has now persisted over several patches now and I've tried repairing my game and even doing a full reinstall. I have a decent enough machine and the game was running fine until recently.

replies.body:
Hmmmm it sounds like your network is having problems with packet loss from how you describe it. Basically, packet loss means parts of your connection are getting lost before it ever reaches our servers, which can make this type of issue out of our hands. Let's test really quick for any packet loss to see what exactly is going on before jumping to any conclusions though.

Grab your latest network logs from a game that had that weird lag, and let this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan it. Post a screenshot of what it shows you back here so I can take a look with you!

Thanks so much! [Here's](https://goo.gl/eC96Tg) the log from my latest game where the issue took place

Oh snap, yea so it looks like that game was suffering from an *awful* lot of packet loss, upwards of 45% even. Basically, that means only *HALF* of the game data was making it all the way to the servers and back which is why you had that weird lag. I would first take that screenshot to your ISP to show them the issues you're having to see if they can restart or fix the way your connection is being routed.
